evidence: Presence of distinct models, views, and controllers directories under 'app' indicating separation of concerns
Flask framework usage which inherently supports MVC pattern
Clear routing mechanism via 'routes.py' handling HTTP requests and responses
Business logic separated into service classes ('cse_client.py', 'http_client.py') supporting the controller layer
risks: Some business logic may be leaking into route handlers instead of being fully encapsulated in services or models
Tight coupling possible between Flask framework and core logic due to direct imports and dependencies
